choices: Samantha a nurse at the local hospital
Beth a nun at the local church
1.content: What part of the town would you like to start in and as who.
1.title: Pick your character

choices: Sam herself feels a strange tingle in her belly
11.content: Samantha walked the halls of the small town ER. Her shift so far had been uneventful for the most part. A few patients here or their but nothing minor but that is all about to change.
11.title: Samantha a nurse at the local hospital

111.content:
The phone at the nurses station rings. Sam picks it up and listens as information is rapidly relayed to her. A patient is just about to arrive. She is in her mid thirties and in heavy labor. A room will be need immediately for this patient.

Just as she puts the phone down another call comes in. A girl in her late teens about 16-18 the paramedics are unsure as the patients is to alarmed to give them much. She is also very pregnant yet keeps saying it happened today. Odd but not the weirdest thing you've seen on your shift.

Does the phone ring again or do you try to deal with one of these incoming patients.
111.title: The first pregnancy arrives

choices: At the beginning stage of a pregnancy
Full term with an already round belly.
Massively pregnant with a bulging stomach.
1111.content: You prepare a room for the first patient delegating any others to the other nurses on staff. Childbirth is a 'normal' event for the hospital so you take your time. Everything in the room is squared away and ready just as the paramedics wheel the women into the room. Turning to examine her finding she is.....
1111.title: Mid thirties patient

11113.content:
The paramedics have to hold the women down. She isn't struggling against them. In fact her focus is on her shifting orb. Hands clamped tightly around it as the beach ball sized belly writhes and bulges from interior movement. Every few seconds a series of limbs presses against her taught belly. Leaving indents for a second as they seem to explore and prod their mothers womb.

The pregnant women is drenched in sweat. Her response to the strange alien movements inside her is only to pant and moan. The pressure on her uterus must be immense. Out of morbid curiosity you place your hand on the belly and feel something push back against your palm.
11113.title: Massively pregnant with a bulging stomach.

111131.content:
You scream jumping back as a tentacle of some kind presses back against your hand through the womens belly. She wasn't even pregnant with a human! What the hell was going on!

As you watch the motions of her belly increase in tempo. Rocking the mother to be back and forth on the bed her moans coming faster and louder. "Their....their pushing ahh ahhh!" she moans hands clamping around the side of her belly. "I...I can feel them pryingggggg!" she screams the last word a moment later a gush of greenish fluid pours from between the womens legs. "It's pushing! It's ahh it's dragging itself free!" she mutters to herself. Her belly deflating as more of the strange fluid trickle free. The panting women grunts lifting her legs up and opens with a scowl of pain as she pushes with whatever is inside her.
111131.title: A tentacle

1111312.content:
Shaking yourself from your stupor you rush over. You have to help this poor women it's your job! Even as your hands shake you adjust the machines next to her and start to dig through a medical cabinet for ANYTHING that might help. A sudden scream from behind you makes you jump. Spinning you gasp watching as a single dark green tendril emerges from inside the women. Spreading her womenhood open wide it whips in the air slowly. A fellow nurse is the one who drew your attention her hand clamped over her mouth as she now stands just in the doorway.

The middle aged patient pants for a moment before turning toward you her voice is weak but full of driving purpose. "Run....run before it gets you..." Shaking in horror you turn watching the tendril wave it's 'head' around to look at you. Then slowly back to the other nurse.
1111312.title: Try to help!

choices: Grab a scalpel and try to cut Emily free.
Run! You can't help Emily now.
Grab the phone and call for security or anybody!
11113122.content:
Emily your coworker screams as the tendril darts forward wrapping around her leg. With a thud she hits on ground on her back kicking as she is dragged toward the patient. You stumble back hands bracing yourself against a small trolley. The sound of your heart hammering in your ears. The patients screams several more tendrils emerging from her womenhood. You gasp watching her belly glow and swell as the creature somehow refills her womb even as it is 'birthed'

The new limbs dripping with fluids all dart forward dragging Emily up into the air. Her scrub pants are torn aside revealing her bright white panties to the room. Your coworkers gaze shifts to you as she screams the tendril pulling her legs wide open. You're frozen this can't be happening!

The next action pulls you from your daze. Twin tendrils rush forward pushing aside the nurses panties as they both drive hard into her sex. Emilys back arches her mouth open in a silent scream as the tentacles bury themselves deep inside. So deep the outlines can be seen writhing just under her belly button. The mother of these horrors watches on with half closed eyes all energy lost. Her hips sway with the motions of her 'child' as it starts to push. The nurses belly swells growing in size moment by moment until it matches the size of the patients. The two of them connected by an inhuman abomination.

You finally find your will and make a hasty decision.
11113122.title: Your coworker is attacked

111131222.content:
As you take one final look at the patient and Emily you make run for the door. as you run towards the door though multiple tentacles shoots out of the patients pussy and reaches for your legs.
Do you dodge the tentacles or do you get caught and end up now like your coworker and the patient
111131222.title: Run! You can't help Emily now.

1113.content:
Sam directs a few of the less senior nurses to deal with theses incoming patients. She's to busy and it's just another labor in the hospitals busy schedule. Sipping a cup of coffee to stay alert she starts on some everyday paperwork ignoring the hustle and bustle around her. The phone unsurprisingly rings once more.

Picking it up the EMT on the other line rapidly spouts off information about the incoming emergency. Mid twenties, complaining of stomach pain and is having trouble concentrating.

OR

The second patient they collected at the same location. Another mid twenties who is very very pregnant the EMT is a bit confused as this women also says she wasn't like this that morning. She is calm and in no pain just in shock that she has a massive pregnant belly. Odd two cases that sound the same in one night?

Which do you help? The staff is getting busy and they will need you this time.
1113.title: New Patients.

12.content:
It was late evening and the weekend bible study was coming to a close. The mother daughter only weekend had been a hit! Plenty of pairs had arrived to join in reading the good book. Perhaps the church had protected this unknowing group from the events unfolding across town. That was all coming to an end in a few moments as spirits gathered from the nearby cemetery seeking empty wombs to be reborn.

Another even darker and more dangerous set of spirits gathered as well. Drawn by the weakened holy place and the virginal women inside. Demons preferred these untouched wombs to grow and now they to descended on the church.

To battle this god was sending his angels but they to would need wombs to grown in as well.
12.title: Beth a nun at the local church

choices: A portal opens in her womb
122.content:
The strange symbols had started to appear just a few days ago. Beth had been having nightmares. Waking in a cold sweat only to remember brief flashes of her horrors. Demons of all shapes and sizes violated her in her dreams. At first she thought it was just her mind telling her to pray more so she did.

She was going to tell the head nun of her troubles until one morning she awoke to a burning on her belly. Strange runes at appeared just below her belly button. The symbols were a dark black and incomprehensible to the young women. She kept these secret fearing what the church might do if they found out. As each night passed more horrible creatures flashed in her dreams. Centuars, minotaurs, demons with wings and horns. All manor of foul abominations assaulted her in her sleeping mind. Each new creature added yet another foul rune to her belly. One morning as she awoke to find a final symbol burning brightly in the center of the rest on her belly she felt a dread fill her.
122.title: Demon rebirth!

choices: The gym, volleyball practice is in full swing.
13.content: It was the senior classes last day of school before the long summer and collage for most of them. The school was buzzing with excitement as the soon to be graduating class wandered the halls they had spent most of their formative years in. Much like the rest of town a few strange occurrences had been taking. Some of the girls had suddenly been pulled from classes or just not shown up for the past week. Rumors whirled that they had all been secretly pregnant and the local hospital was keeping it hush hush. Where do we begin the journey here?
13.title: Orange grove high school

choices: No. I don't want them thinking I'm pregnant. I cant be
135.content:
A small group of three outcast girls, Kassie, Jess, and Lauren were in the girl's bathroom, smoking cigarettes. "Have you heard the rumor that girls at our school are suddenly getting pregnant and going to the hospital to give birth"Kassie asked, blowing out smoke from the cigarette.
"Mhmm..it's odd" Lauren says. "I also heard that the girls are birthing creatures like demons, ghosts,and more" Jess was very quiet about the situation. She had been feeling a weird feeling in her stomach that was getting stronger by the minute. She was debating telling her friends.
135.title: Smoking in the girls bathroom.

1351.content: "G-Guys...there's a weird feeling in my stomach. And it's getting stronger"Jess says,holding her stomach as Lauren and Kassie looked worried. "We should get a teacher"Kassie says. Lauren immediately yelled "No! We could get in trouble! And besides! We could have living proof if the feeling is the sudden pregnancy" Lauren adds getting her phone out. Jess started to groan as the feeling got a bit stronger and her stomach started to grow a bit. It was obvious she was now a victim of the sudden pregnancy. Kassie was stuck on recording and revealing it to the public or tell a teacher and get Jess to the hospital.
1351.title: Yes. They need to know.

choices: Try to turn on the phone
1352.content:
"Guys I'm gonna head to the gym room since that's my next class"Jess says

Kassie and Lauren nods "alright see ya later"lauren states. Jess grabs her things and walks out of the room. She felt a surge in her stomach,which seemed to be her stomach pushing outward. She decided to head to another room instead,a room no one would go into. She goes to one of the abandoned classrooms and locked herself in. Soon she felt a series of surges in her stomach which seemed to make it grow bigger and bigger. She noticed that not only her stomach was growing but that pregnancy sexual drive was also growing with it. She waddled over to a desk and leaned against the corner of it. She noticed that the sex drive was calming down but the pregnancy belly was already appearing to be 7 months pregnant and still growing. She saw blue and red glowing orbs flying around her. She belly surged out more until it was perfectly rounded. She grabbed her phone and tried to call 911 but her phone froze when those three numbers were dialed, then the phone shut off. She waddled to the door and trief to unlock it but the entire door got covered in a shadow like material. Her belly soon got too heavy for her and she collapsed, and finally the growing stopped. But that means another problem is gonna start. Jess felt a warm liquid in between her legs,and then a horrific pain was felt and movement in the belly increased
1352.title: No. I don't want them thinking I'm preg...

choices: At a stable just finishing up with a farm animal
Back at her office dealing with the newborn pups
Attending to animals at the zoo.
14.content: It had been a long day for the hard working vet of Orange Grove. She had to deliver several horses a cow and even a litter of pups from her neighbors dog. Half the people didn't even know their animals were pregnant. After all this where is Rebecca at this very moment?
14.title: Rebecca a veterinarian

choices: Start to feel a bit strange all the sudden.
A person walks into the clinic with their pet.
143.content: The tired women slumps into her chair. The hour was late and finally she could take a break. The German shepherd had finally finished with her labor. A healthy set of pups were successfully brought into the world. Spinning in her chair she checks on her emails making sure no one else has any last minute pregnancies to deal with on this crazy day. Lucky for her it seemed most of it was done. A few odd questions to answer about her current patients and she could finally go home.
143.title: Back at her office dealing with the newborn pups

144.content:
Of all the places Rebecca thought she would end up today behind the rear end of a heavily pregnant Rhino was not one of them. She currently had almost her entire arm inside of the laboring beast. Feeling around for the stuck baby inside. The on staff zoo vet was busy dealing with another birth in the neighboring lion exhibit. The other zoo staff also rushing from place to place as almost all of the animals on sight were going into labor.

This day was just getting weirder and weirder for all of them.

Twisting her hand inside of the female rhinos birth canal she finally got the babies leg unstuck. A gush of fluids pouring form the mother as her heavy contraction pushed the baby finally past her cervix and into the canal proper. Pulling away Rebecca stripped off the plastic shoulder length glove. Hands on her hips she watched for a few more moments confident the rhino could make it through the rest of her labor. It was to busy for her to stay and monitor the beast as she rushed off to go help another straining mother to be.

(Leaving this one completely open for everyone until I can come up with a few scenarios.)
144.title: Attending to animals at the zoo.

choices: Run you can't stop a lion!
Shut the door it's to dangerous.
1442.content:
Rebecca jogged her way toward the lions den. A large exhibit near the back of the zoo. All of the lioness had gone into labor as well today. Odd as that was it was even more concerning that not a single one had been pregnant the night before. The zoo closely monitored such events and did not have any explanation for why the lions and almost every single female animal was in labor.

Panting Rebecca opening the rear door that connected a hidden room behind the enclosure. It was where staff could go to observe or work on animals outside of the public eye. As the heavy steel door opened she gasped in horror. The first thing that hit her was the smell of birthing fluids. All of the female lions were in labor here in one room. What shocked her was not the females lions but what the male was doing. Braced against the wall Jenny the local vet was struggling. The large dominate male of the pride was tearing at her but she wasn't being eaten.

It's powerful front paws were wrapped around the brunettes slim waist. Her long work pants were torn and ripped. Exposing her lower half to the beasts thrusts. It's spine covered cock was slamming into her. Making the women scream as it plunged deeper and deeper. With a roar the lions legs tensed. Flexing as it hilted itself.

Rebecca took a step back a hand covering her mouth. "Help me!" Jenny screamed finally noticing the other women. "It's....ahhh....it's cumming!" she sobbed clutching her belly. The lion remained locked against her it's furry testicles pulsing as they poured there virile load deep into the women warm folds. The tip of it's cock pressed against her cervix spraying thick globs of beast cum directly into her womb.

Rebeccas had to make a choice what would she do. The shock was wearing off would she help? Run? Slam the door?
1442.title: Into the lions den

choices: Meggy, an artist and nature lover.
Helen, a cranky middle aged bus driver.
15.title: More women.

info.brief_description: You're a women during a strange event. Everyone is getting suddenly very pregnant!
info.description:
A strange event is unfolding in the small town of Orange Grove. Women are arriving at the hospital massively pregnant. It seems the town has been hit with a plague of some kind leading to strange and unheard of pregnancies.

This interactive will focus on odd human pregnancies. Women suddenly finding themselves carrying inhuman animals and creatures from mythology and beyond.

You will be playing a series of women all trying to figure out why this is happening and dealing with its belly expanding consequences.

(Additions are welcome just try to keep the story flowing in a reasonable directions. No out of the blue randomness.)
